title: Inside Katie Price’s £2million house as she hits back at 'mucky mansion' claims
text:
Katie Price blessed us all with a tour of her house, in a bid to halt those persistent mucky mansion claims, once and for all.

Taking to her YouTube channel, the 41-year-old gave fans a warts-and-all glimpse into her £2million West Sussex home.

In the tour, the mum-of-five showed off countless rooms, filled to the brim with piles and piles of clothes on every surface.

Speaking to viewers, she admitted that she was attempting to clear her home out and offload her belongings on eBay – which might take her longer than she first thought.

However, she did little to dispel the mucky rumours as she spoke to the camera against a white wall, covered in colourful drawings and crayon squiggles.

Katie also showed off her love of underwear and tights, before confessing she’s quite boring in the bedroom department, contrary to popular belief.

Katie Price showed off her ‘mucky mansion’ in a house tour (Picture: YouTube)

Katie has rooms covered in clothes (Picture: YouTube)

Flaunting her extensive collection of suspenders, Peter Andre’s ex asked: ‘Would you think I’m boring in bed looking at all this?

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m so b****y boring. I just love stockings and suspenders. I love it.’

Standing in the middle of one room, packed full of clothes and undies, she told two helpers: ‘It’s exhausting to know where to start.

‘This gives me a headache, to be honest.’

Katie’s stables are overwhelmed with clutter (Picture: YouTube)

She hit out at the mucky mansion claims, insisting she’s having work done (Picture: YouTube)

Grabbing one bag and mucking in, Katie insisted: ‘At least if I’ve done one bag, I’ll feel like I’ve done well.’

It might take a few more bags, hun…

Katie then took a second to addressing the messy rumours head on, fuming: ‘My house… Everyone is calling it “mucky mansion”.

‘Yes, because I’m not living in my house. It’s empty. I’m doing stuff to it and something has gone wrong.

Katie explained she isn’t living in her house at the moment (Picture: YouTube)

‘I’ll explain that in due course. I have builders inside my house, my post gets moved here, there and everywhere.’

She might want to get moving on those renovations, after it was claimed she was planning to host weddings in the £2million home.

‘Katie’s house and grounds could be beautiful, and she thinks it’ll make a perfect wedding venue when it’s finished,’ an insider reportedly told The Sun.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘After all, who knows more about getting married or weddings than Katie?

‘She’s planning a huge overhaul to make it look like the dream wedding venue, with rooms for the bride and groom to stay in.’

Saying your vows inside a place of showbiz history? Count. Us. In.

description: Katie Price blessed us all with a tour of her house, in a bid to laugh off those persistent mucky mansion claims.
